vibesExplanation:
The video "20 minute Cycling Workout for Beginners" is primarily characterized by "The Endorphin Wave" vibe with a score of 0.75. This is due to the steady build of energy and feel-good movement described in both the video description and comments. The workout design, featuring a warm-up, speed increases, climbs, and sprints, supports elevated energy and progressive intensity typical of this vibe. Moreover, numerous comments from users report a sense of accomplishment and enjoyment, further reinforcing this perception.

Secondly, it embodies "The Groove Session" with a score of 0.6. The inclusion of a varied music playlist and emphasis on enjoying the ride aligns with the fun and fluid qualities of this vibe. This is supported by user feedback expressing newfound enjoyment in cardio and a motivating musical experience.

Finally, the workout possesses elements of "The Meditative Grind" with a score of 0.55. The repetitive cycling motion and encouragement to maintain a steady pace suggest a zone-in quality, helping participants mediate between effort and relaxation.

"The Nightclub Workout" and "The Competitor" were considered but excluded due to lack of intense party or competitive elements.
